TopicTitle: Made a tutorial/demonstration video for interception and docking.

Articles.Content:
KSP inspired me to post my first youtube video

It's a demonstration & tutorial of a complete interception and docking flight as I complete my refueling space station. I also demonstrate refueling using the Kerbal Attachment System mod.

Overall I think it came out well. I intentionally left in some piloting mistakes as I think it makes a better tutorial/demonstration when your watching something that's not perfect, and are able to see how they are corrected.

Full 1080p, let me know what you think.
Nice tutorial! I haven't got any mods installed on my KSP, may get some later... you know after I am used to the mechanics of orbital and interplanetary flight.

Yeah I played for a good amount of time before I tried any of the mods. Once I had successfully landed on the moon and eve I started looking into them. The good ones add a lot I think. That said, the tutorial section of the video doesn't rely on any mods, its the same if you had none.
